sect2.title: Contents
sect2.para: The Heimdal package contains afslog, dump_log, ftp, ftpd, hprop, hpropd, ipropd-master, ipropd-slave, kadmin, kadmind, kauth, kdc, kdestroy, kf, kfd, kgetcred, kinit, klist, kpasswd, kpasswdd, krb5-config, kstash, ktutil, kx, kxd, login, mk_cmds, otp, otpprint, pagsh, pfrom, popper, push, rcp, replay_log, rsh, rshd, rxtelnet, rxterm, string2key, su, telnet, telnetd, tenletxr, truncate_log, verify_krb5_conf, xnlock, libasn1, libeditline, libgssapi, libhdb, libkadm5clnt, libkadm5srv, libkafs, libkrb5, libotp, libroken, libsl and libss.

sect3.title: afslog
sect3.para: afslog obtains AFS tokens for a number of cells.

sect3.title: hprop
sect3.para: hprop takes a principal database in a specified format and converts it into a stream of Heimdal database records.

sect3.title: hpropd
sect3.para: hpropd receives a database sent by hprop and writes it as a local database.

sect3.title: kadmin
sect3.para: kadmin is an utility used to make modifications to the Kerberos database.

sect3.title: kadmind
sect3.para: kadmind is a server for administrative access to Kerberos database.

sect3.title: kauth, kinit
sect3.para: kauth and kinit are used to authenticate to the Kerberos server as principal and acquire a ticket granting ticket that can later be used to obtain tickets for other services.

sect3.title: kdc
sect3.para: kdc is a Kerberos 5 server.

sect3.title: kdestroy
sect3.para: kdestroy removes the current set of tickets.

sect3.title: kf
sect3.para: kf is a program which forwards tickets to a remote host through an authenticated and encrypted stream.

sect3.title: kfd
sect3.para: kfd receives forwarded tickets.

sect3.title: kgetcred
sect3.para: kgetcred obtains a ticket for a service.

sect3.title: klist
sect3.para: klist reads and displays the current tickets in the credential cache.

sect3.title: kpasswd
sect3.para: kpasswd is a program for changing Kerberos 5 passwords.

sect3.title: kpasswdd
sect3.para: kpasswdd is a Kerberos 5 password changing server.

sect3.title: krb5-config
sect3.para: krb5-config gives information on how to link programs against Heimdal libraries.

sect3.title: kstash
sect3.para: kstash stores the KDC master password in a file.

sect3.title: ktutil
sect3.para: ktutil is a program for managing Kerberos keytabs.

sect3.title: kx
sect3.para: kx is a program which securely forwards X connections.

sect3.title: kxd
sect3.para: kxd is the daemon for kx.

sect3.title: otp
sect3.para: otp manages one-time passwords.

sect3.title: otpprint
sect3.para: otpprint prints lists of one-time passwords.

sect3.title: rxtelnet
sect3.para: rxtelnet program starts an xterm window with a telnet to given host and forwards X connections.

sect3.title: rxterm
sect3.para: rxterm starts a secure remote xterm.

sect3.title: string2key
sect3.para: string2key maps a password into a key.

sect3.title: tenletxr
sect3.para: tenletxr forwards X connections backwards.

sect3.title: verify_krb5_conf
sect3.para: verify_krb5_conf checks krb5.conf file for obvious errors.

sect3.title: xnlock
sect3.para: xnlock is a program that acts as a secure screen saver for workstations running X.
